TitlePage.Abstract:
This document describes the package Float, which implements in &GAP; arbitrary-precision floating-point numbers.
The computer algebra system &GAP; is available at http://gap-system.org.
This documentation for Float is available at http://mad.epfl.ch/~laurent/Float/floatdoc.tar.gz and http://mad.epfl.ch/~laurent/Float/floatdoc.zoo; the manual is available at http://mad.epfl.ch/~laurent/Float/manual.pdf in PDF format, and may be accessed online at http://mad.epfl.ch/~laurent/Float/.
The latest source of the package may be downloaded as http://mad.epfl.ch/~laurent/Float/float.tar.gz (tar, gzipped) and http://mad.epfl.ch/~laurent/Float/float.zoo (zoo).
For comments or questions on Float please contact the author; this package is still under development.
